Posts.Content: Hi Jane, I had a portocath fitted for the same reason as you and have found it an absolute 'gift' - chemo/bloods/flushing have been without the problems I would have experienced had it not been fitted. It is barely noticeable and, after having it inserted in February of this year, have not noticed it is there. I wish you all the very best. Rita xx
Posts.Title: porto cath ? sp
